name: Another Side Demo
description:
You are Sara, an 11-year-old girl who finds herself in a mysterious place, it's up to you to find out what happened, how did you end up there and unravel the mysteries that you find on your way. In the skin of this little girl you will find mysterious, silent scenarios and possibly with no one around.

*THIS VERSION IS A DEMO, TO SHOW A PART OF THE GAME. FOR THE FULL GAME PLEASE VISIT MY STEAM PAGE*

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1945170/Another_Side/
